metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3618 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
ALPACA is an application layer protocol content confusion attack, exploiting TLS servers implementing different protocols but using compatible certificates, such as multi-domain or wildcard certificates. A MiTM attacker having access to victim's traffic at the TCP/IP layer can redirect traffic from one subdomain to another, resulting in a valid TLS session. This breaks the authentication of TLS and cross-protocol attacks may be possible where the behavior of one protocol service may compromise the other at the application layer.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3618` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnginx-mod-http-auth-pam - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-cache-purge - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-dav-ext - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-echo - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-fancyindex - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-geoip - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-geoip2 - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-headers-more-filter - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-image-filter - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-ndk - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-perl - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-subs-filter - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-uploadprogress - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-upstream-fair - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-http-xslt-filter - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-mail - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-nchan - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-rtmp - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-stream - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-stream-geoip - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
libnginx-mod-stream-geoip2 - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
nginx - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
nginx-common - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
nginx-core - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
nginx-extras - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
nginx-full - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
nginx-light - 1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the mail proxy mechanisms aren't included in nginx.conf by default

criterions.comment: nginx package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.0-6ubuntu11.1').
sendmail package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
vsftpd package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
